Embassy Suites Miami International Airport Pre-Post Cruise Package Book SRP Code CRU Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium Jungle Island historic Coral Gables Miami*s trendy South Beach and of course the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk. Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures. Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses Miami Spa Services In-Suite Miami Sports Arena*s including homes of the Dolphins Heat and Marlins. The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach Miami Museums the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses health industries world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs discotheques and art galleries in the world.
